thread.title: WATCH: California congressman forced to sing 'Meet the Mets' after losing NLDS bet
thread.title_full: WATCH: California congressman forced to sing 'Meet the Mets' after losing NLDS bet | NJ.com

author: Maria Guardado | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: WATCH: California congressman forced to sing 'Meet the Mets' after losing NLDS bet
text:
Looks like politicians are jumping on the Mets bandwagon, even if it's not entirely by choice.
PLUS : Mets' Kelly Johnson scouts the Kansas City Royals, Toronto Blue Jays
On Friday, Rep. Adam Schiff (D-CA) was forced to sing "Meet the Mets" on the floor of the U.S. House after losing a bet with Rep. Steve Israel (D-N.Y.). Schiff wagered that the Los Angeles Dodgers would beat the Mets in the National League Division Series, but he had to swallow his pride and concede defeat after New York won the matchup in five games.
Check out the video above to watch Schiff's amusing performance.
